description:
An old enemy of Garp`s reveals Luffy`s true identity, landing the Straw Hat captain in hot water with one of his fellow competitors. Meanwhile, the battle in Block B gets supremely brutal!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Names Duke It Out! The Heated Block B Battle!
Gun`yuu Kakkyo! Hakunetsu no B Block!
L’affrontement des rivaux. Ça chauffe dans le bloc B !
Бои главных соперников! Жаркая ситуация в Блоке B!
نزالات بين الأقوياء! معركة المجموعة ب الحامية!
群雄割拠! 白熱のBブロック!
